Class AppConstants

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.hexeditor.AppConstants
public final class AppConstants extends Object
This class contains all the global constants that are used throughout the application.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ALL_CHANGES_WINDOW_FXML_FILENAME
    The name of the FXML file for the View All Changes window.
    static final int
    CHUNK_SIZE
    The maximum number of bytes associated with a row when data is read in and stored at an index in a LazyHexList.
    static final String
    EMBED_MESSAGE_WINDOW_FXML_FILENAME
    The name of the FXML file for the Embed Message window.
    static final String
    HELP_URL
    The URL for the help page.
    static final String
    MAIN_WINDOW_FXML_FILENAME
    The name of the FXML file for the main window of the application.
